Lansing.Archer Stadium:
Archer Stadium is a 1,500 seat soccer stadium located in East Lansing, Michigan. Its primary tenants are East Lansing High School, Lansing United of the Premier Development League, and Lansing United Women of United Women's Soccer.


== History ==
In 2013, the two varsity fields at the East Lansing Soccer Complex were renamed "Archer Stadium" to honor over 40 years of service from East Lansing High School coach Nick Archer.
